name: Crispy Cornmeal Drop Doughnuts
author: SeedyMe NC
summary: These are my rendition of a sweet hush puppy. They are quick and easy to make and are great for breakfast or with coffee. I like them plain, but they are yummy rolled in cinnamon and sugar, too.
ingredients: peanut or corn oil for frying
directions: Heat oil in deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
In a bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal mix, sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg
In a separate bowl, beat the egg together with the buttermilk
Gradually add the egg mixture to the dry ingredients, stirring with a fork or whisk until only slightly lumpy
Carefully drop batter by the rounded teaspoonful into hot oil, and fry until golden brown
Drain and cool on a paper towel-lined plate
